definitions.definition: a bright yellow metal made from copper and zinc:
examples: The door handles were made of brass.

definitions.definition: the group of brass instruments or players in a band or orchestra:
examples: The brass seems to me to be too loud in this recording.

definitions.definition: a thin piece of brass on the floor or wall in a church, with a picture or writing cut into it:
examples: The church has several beautiful medieval brasses.

definitions.definition: (of a musical instrument) made of metal and played by blowing:
examples: The trumpet and trombone are brass instruments.
